sentence: The Russian ship MV Akademik Shokalskiy has become trapped in Antarctic ice since 24 December, due to a blizzard pushing broken out ice from another part of the continent around the ship.
The event is likely to be a result of long-term climate change, affecting 74 passengers onboard, including scientists, tourists and crewmen.
The Australian Aurora Australis engaged in rescuing efforts but the ship was unable to break through and risked becoming stuck itself.
The Chinese icebreaker, Xue Long, also failed in similar attempts; its helicopter later airlifted the passengers to the Australian icebreaker which would reach Tasmania in mid-January.
